mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBOARD( IBOARD_NO, IBOARD_TITLE, IBOARD_CONTENT, IBOARD_WRITER, PROJECT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_IBOARD.NEXTVAL, #{iboardTitle}, #{iboardContent}, #{iboardWriter}, #{projectNo} )

INSERT INTO IATTACHMENT( IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_IATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_IBOARD.CURRVAL, #{iAttachmentOrigin}, #{iAttachmentPath}, #{iAttachmentChange}, #{iAttachmentLevel} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(I.IBOARD_NO)) FROM IBOARD I, PRELATION PR, TAGS TG, PROJECT P WHERE PR.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_NO AND PR.TAGS_NO = TG.TAGS_NO AND TG.TAGS_NAME IN #{item} AND I.IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL AND (I.IBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR I.IBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR P.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY ${sort} DESC

SELECT DISTINCT I.IBOARD_NO AS "IBOARD_NO", I.IBOARD_TITLE AS "IBOARD_TITLE", P.PROJECT_NAME AS "PROJECT_NO", I.IBOARD_VIEWS AS "IBOARD_VIEWS", TO_CHAR(I.IBOARD_INSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "IBOARD_INSERT", P.PROJECT_START AS "PROJECT_START", P.PROJECT_END AS "PROJECT_END" FROM IBOARD I, PROJECT P, PRELATION PR, TAGS TG WHERE I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_NO AND P.RPOJECT_NO = PR.PROJECT_NO AND TG.TAGS_NAME IN #{item} AND I.IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL AND (I.IBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR I.IBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR P.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY ${sort} DESC

SELECT IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_INSERT, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL FROM IATTACHMENT WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE IBOARD SET IBOARD_VIEWS = IBOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT PR.PROJECT_NO, T.TAGS_NAME AS "TAGS_NO" FROM PRELATION PR, TAGS T WHERE PRELATION.TAGS_NO = T.TAGS_NO AND PR.PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IREPLY(IREPLY_NO, IBOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, IREPLY_CONTENT, IREPLY_INSERT) VALUES(SEQ_IREPLY.NEXTVAL, #{iboardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{ireplyContent}, SYSDATE)
